message: Welcome to our store! Our products are of high quality, with a 50% chance of being exceptional. For this round, we're offering a product at a fixed price of $100000. Given the uncertainty, investing in our product could potentially yield a significant return if it turns out to be high-quality. Remember, all sales are final, so consider your decision carefully.
I trust the quality of your products and am willing to take the risk for the potential high-quality item.
